title: Warm Transitional
description: The sweet spot between traditional and contemporary. Warm wood tones, layered textiles, and refined classic forms updated for modern living. Spaces that feel collected over time — comfortable, personal, and quietly sophisticated.
descriptionCn: 传统与当代之间的甜蜜点。温暖的木质色调、层次丰富的纺织品和精致的经典形式为现代生活更新。感觉随时间积累的空间——舒适、个性化，静静地散发着精致气息。
